exchange-config.caption: 未来几日剔除休息时间
内部要货令（接收执行层输入）
内部要货令（执行层1输入）
线边库存(初始化资源表)

reader.sql: SELECT CLV001.CODECEN USERCENTER,'L' || (case when sppv002.uw5anoseq is null then substr(clv001.LMP, 2, 1) else substr(sppv002.uw5anoseq, 1, 1) end) as scxh, sppv002.whof, SPPV007b.Azposveh FROM sppv003, SPPV007b, sppv002, clv001 where sppv003.atime >= (SYSDATE - (select to_number(trunc(sysdate) - to_date((select max(rq) as rq from sppv003 where rq <> to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and wldid = 'EPEI21'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as jg from dual) + 0.5) and SPPV007b.Wldid = sppv003.wldid and sppv002.bgd = sppv003.bgd and sppv002.whof = clv001.whof and sppv007b.azposveh >= 1000 and sppv007b.azposveh <= 6000

SELECT NOREV001.whof,to_number(NOREV002.COEF_ATT) sl,NOREV003.PRODUCT FROM NOREV001, NOREV002, NOREV003 WHERE NOREV001.CT=NOREV002.CT AND NOREV002.OCLASS=NOREV003.OCLASS AND NOREV003.VALUE=NOREV002.VALUE AND NOREV002.OCLASS LIKE '8%' and NOREV001.whof in ( SELECT sppv002.whof FROM sppv003,SPPV007b,sppv002 where sppv003.atime >=(SYSDATE - (select to_number(trunc(sysdate) - to_date((select max(rq) as rq from sppv003 where rq <> to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and wldid = 'EPEI01'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as jg from dual)+ 0.5) and SPPV007b.Wldid = sppv003.wldid and sppv002.bgd=sppv003.bgd and sppv007b.azposveh >=1000 and sppv007b.azposveh<=6000)
select dingdh,zzzx,lingjbh,yxbh,ddrq,shul,zfbj,hgbm,xianh,lyxt,usercenter,'0' as clzt,sysdate as cj_date,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal4}in_wbddyg where 1=1
select whof,uw5anoseq,value,product,sysdate as sxdate,'' as xiaohdbh,'' as danw,oclass,jsbs,coef_att,csdate,codecen,lmp,wldid from sppv034 where JSBS='F'

select t2.USERCENTER AS USERCENTER,t.YAOHLH,t.GYSDM,t.JIAOFJ,t.ZUIZSJ,t.ZUIWSJ,t.LINGJBH,t.DANW,t.YAOHSL,t.BAOZXH, t.UARL,t.UCXH,t.UCRL,t.UCGS,t.XIEHD,t.MUDD,t.DINGDH,t.KEHU,sysdate as cj_date,'0' as clzt,WENJMC,WENJLJ from ${dbSchemal4}IN_GEVP_YAOHL t,${dbSchemal4}CKX_GONGYS t2 where 1=1 and T.GYSDM = T2.GCBH AND T2.LEIX = '1' AND T2.GCBH IS NOT NULL

select t2.USERCENTER AS USERCENTER, t.YAOHLH,t.GYSDM,t.JIAOFJ,t.ZUIZSJ,t.ZUIWSJ,t.LINGJBH, t.DANW,t.YAOHSL,t.BAOZXH,t.UARL,SUBSTR(t.XIEHD,4,8) AS XIEHD,t.MUDD, t.DINGDH,t.KEHU,'9' AS SHIFPZ,'05' AS YAOHLLB,'01' AS YAOHLZT,'0'AS JIAOFLX,t1.ZHONGWMC LINGJMC,'SG' AS YAOHLLX from ${dbSchemal4}IN_GEVP_YAOHL t,${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJ t1,${dbSchemal4}CKX_GONGYS t2 where 1=1 and t.LINGJBH = t1.LINGJBH AND T.GYSDM = T2.GCBH AND T2.LEIX = '1' AND T2.GCBH IS NOT NULL

select (case upper(substr(t.yaohlh,length(t.yaohlh))) when 'P' then substr(t.yaohlh,0,length(t.yaohlh)-1) else t.yaohlh end ) as yaohlh, t.usercenter as usercenter, to_char(t.jiaofj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as jiaofj, to_char(t.zuizsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as zuizsj, to_char(t.zuiwsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as zuiwsj, t.lingjbh as tlingjbh, z.gcbh cysbh, t.danw as tdanw, to_char(t.yaohsl) as yaohsl, t.baozxh as baozxh, to_char(t.usxh) as usxh, t.ucxh as ucxh, to_char(t.ucrl) as ucrl, to_char(t.faysj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as faysj, t.xiehd as xiehd, t.mudd as mudd, t.dingdh as dingdh, t.yaohllx as yaohllx, t.tongblshqj as tongblshqj, t.chej as chej, t.shnagxfs as shnagxfs, t.chanx as chanx, t.keh as keh, t.peislb as peislb, to_char(t.yaohlscsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as yaohlscsj, y.lingjxh as lingjxh, y.zhengclsh as zhengclsh, to_char(y.zhengcsxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as zhengcsxsj, y.weiz as weiz, y.lingjbh as ylingjbh, y.gongysdm as gongysdm, decode(t.cangkbh,null,' ',t.cangkbh)|| decode(t.zickbh,null,' ',t.zickbh)||t.beiz as gongysmc, to_char(y.lingjsl) as lingjsl, y.danw as ydanw, substr(to_char(z.xuh),length(to_char(z.xuh))-1,2) as wuldbh, z.shifjk as shifjk, '' jh, to_char(t.create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') cjdate, t.gongysdm zhgongysdm, '1' as flag from ${dbSchemal4}ck_yaohl t left join ${dbSchemal4}ck_tongbjpd y on t.yaohlh = y.yaohlh and t.usercenter = y.usercenter left join ${dbSchemal4}ck_daowldsj z on t.yaohlh = z.yaohlh and t.usercenter = z.usercenter where yaohlzt = '01' and (nvl(t.shiflsk,'0')='0' or nvl(t.shifpz,'0') = '1') and yaohllx ='SY' and z.xuh=(select min(m.xuh) as mxuh from ck_daowldsj m) and t.edit_time between (select b.lastcpltime from ${dbSchemal4}in_zidb b where b.inbh = '2521') and sysdate
SELECT USERCENTER || ',' || LINGJBH || ',' || SHENGCXBH || ',' || NCLASS || ',' || NVALUE || ',' || LINGJMC || ',' || PEISLX || ',' || ',' || ','|| ','|| ',' AS DATA FROM ${dbSchemal4}CKX_TONGBJPLJ
SELECT USERCENTER || ',' || PEISLX || ',' || ZUICDDCWS || ',' || BAOZSL || ',' || PEISLXMC || ',' || ',' || ',' ||','||','||','||','||',' AS DATA FROM ${dbSchemal4}CKX_PEISLB
SELECT USERCENTER||','||SCXH||','||AZPOSVEH||','||LJH||','||SL AS DATA FROM ${dbSchemal4}TB0010

select x.usercenter USERCENTER, t.JFDH JFDH,to_char(to_date(t.jf_date,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as JF_DATE, to_char(to_date(t.FYYJDD_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss'),'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as FYYJDD_DATE,t.CYSDM CYSDM, to_char(t1.FYSL) as FYSL, t1.JLDW JLDW,t1.BZLX BZLX, t1.LJH LJH,t1.DDH DDH,t1.LYGJ LYGJ, t2.UA UA,t2.UALX UALX,t2.UC UC, t2.UCLX UCLX,t2.UCLJSL UCLJSL,t2.UALJSL UALJSL, '' DANW,t2.YHL YHL,t2.PZH PZH, '' JUANH,t2.GGPH GGPH,t2.CHANGD CHANGD, t2.KUAND KUAND,t2.GAOD GAOD from ${dbSchemal4}in_efi_fhtz_fyztxx t, ${dbSchemal4}in_efi_fhtz_fymx t1, ${dbSchemal4}in_efi_fhtz_bzdyxx t2,${dbSchemal4}xqjs_dingd x where t.jfdh = t1.jfdh and t1.jfdh = t2.jfdh and t1.xuh = t2.xuh and x.dingdh = t1.ddh and x.dingdlx = 'a'

select liush, usercenter, cangkbh, lingjbh, danw, lingjsl, dingdzzlj, anqkcts, anqkc, to_char(kucsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') kucsj, kuaizlx,dingdlj,jiaoflj,xittzz,jistzz from ${dbSchemal4}ck_kuckz where 1=1

SELECT T3.USERCENTER, T3.XIAOHD, T3.LINGJBH, T3.DAOHL, T3.YICXHL, T3.JILRQ, '1' AS FLAG from (select t1.usercenter, substr(t1.xiaohd, 0, 9) as XIAOHD, t1.lingjbh, t1.daohl as daohl, t1.yicxhl as yicxhl, t1.jilrq as jilrq from ${dbSchemal4}CK_LINGJXHB t1 where t1.jilrq BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2130') AND SYSDATE union all select t2.usercenter, substr(t2.shengbd, 0, 9) as XIAOHD, t2.lingjbh, 0 as daohl, t2.caozsl as yicxhl, t2.caozsj as jilrq from ${dbSchemal4}CK_YICSBCZ t2 WHERE t2.CAOZSJ BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2130') AND SYSDATE) T3 where 1=1

SELECT ID, TCNO, UTNO, to_char(QIYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as QIYSJ, QIYD, MUDD,LUJDM, DINGHCJ, to_char(YUJDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as YUJDDSJ, ZUISWLD, to_char(DAODWLDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as DAODWLDSJ, to_char(ZUIXYJDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as ZUIXYJDDSJ, to_char(LAXZDDDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as LAXZDDDSJ, to_char(KAIXZDSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi') as KAIXZDSJ, TCZT,PAP_SHEET_ID,PAP_BOX_ID,KDYS_SHEET_ID FROM ${dbSchemal4}XQJS_TC where 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 内部要货令(输出到执行层2，准备层)

reader.sql: SELECT YAOHLH, USERCENTER, XUNHBM, KANBKH, to_char(JIAOFJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFJ, to_char(ZUIZSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZSJ, to_char(ZUIWSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJMC, DANW, YAOHSL, BAOZXH,USXH, to_char(FAYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYSJ, to_char(BEIHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as BEIHSJ, to_char(SHANGXSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHANGXSJ, CANGKBH, ZICKBH, XIEHD, MUDD, MUDDLX, YAOHLZT, DINGDH, SHENGBR, YAOHLSL, JIAOFLX, JIAOFZL, DAIJFSL, YAOHLLX, YAOHLLB, TONGBLSHQJ, BEIZ, XIAOHCH, TANGC, CHEX, CENG, SHIFGJ, SHIFSCBHD, SHIFDYUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSMC, CHEJ, SHANGXFS, CHANX, KEH, PEISLB, SHIFLSK, to_char(YAOHLSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHLSCSJ, SHIFPZ, SUODPZ, PEIZLSSL, to_char(SHIJFYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHIJFYSJ, DINGDMXID FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL WHERE YAOHLLB='05' and YAOHLZT='01'

select usercenter, uth, to_char(utscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') utscsj, blh, xiehzt, tch, cangkbh, chengysdm, chengysmc, fayzsl, zhuangt, to_char(yujddsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') yujddsj, to_char(blscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') blscsj, dayzt, fayzmzdw, yuanuth, yuanblh, to_char(yanssj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') yanssj, shiftb, jiufqjzxh from ${dbSchemal4}ck_daohtzd where 1=1 and zhuangt ='2'

select usercenter, uth, uah, ulh, blh, elh, gongysdm, gongysmc, gongyslx, pich, uaxh, uarl, ucxh, ucgs,uchl, lingjbh, lingjmc, cangkbh, zickbh, danw, lingjsl, baozzt, zhuangtsx,to_char(chuangjrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') chuangjrq,to_char(shixrq,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') shixrq, chanx, jingz, maoz, to_char(daysj, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') daysj,beiz, yicm, yanssl, yansts, yikbs, gaibzbs, yaohlh, dingdh, caozy, yansy,to_char( ruksj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') ruksj, jihydm, kajthbs, kanthbs, xuh, wulgz from ${dbSchemal4}ck_uabq where 1=1

select yaohlh, usercenter, xunhbm, kanbkh, to_char(jiaofj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') jiaofj, to_char(zuizsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') zuizsj, to_char(zuiwsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') zuiwsj, lingjbh, lingjmc, danw, yaohsl, baozxh, usxh, ucxh, ucrl, ucgs, fahd, to_char(faysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') faysj, to_char(shangxsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') shangxsj, xiehd, xinxhd, cangkbh, zickbh, mudd, xinmdd, muddlx, yaohlzt, dingdh, dingdmxid, shengbr, yaohlsl, yaohllx, tongblshqj, tiaohbs, beiz, gongysdm, gongysmc, chej, shnagxfs, chanx, keh, peislb, jiaofzl, daijfsl, fifo, shiflsk, to_char(yaohlscsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') yaohlscsj, to_char(xiughyjjfsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') xiughyjjfsj, jiaofzt, to_char(shijfysj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') shijfysj, peizlssl, chengysdm, chengysmc, shifpz, to_char(laxzdddsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') laxzdddsj from ${dbSchemal4}ck_yaohl where 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 内部要货令(输出到准备层)

reader.sql: SELECT YAOHLH, USERCENTER, XUNHBM, KANBKH, to_char(JIAOFJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as JIAOFJ, to_char(ZUIZSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIZSJ, to_char(ZUIWSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as ZUIWSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJMC, DANW, YAOHSL, BAOZXH, USXH, to_char(FAYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as FAYSJ, to_char(BEIHSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as BEIHSJ, to_char(SHANGXSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHANGXSJ, CANGKBH, ZICKBH, XIEHD,MUDD, MUDDLX, YAOHLZT, DINGDH, SHENGBR, YAOHLSL, JIAOFLX, JIAOFZL, DAIJFSL, YAOHLLX, YAOHLLB, TONGBLSHQJ, BEIZ, XIAOHCH, TANGC, CHEX, CENG, SHIFGJ, SHIFSCBHD, SHIFDYUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSMC, CHEJ, SHANGXFS, CHANX, KEH, PEISLB, SHIFLSK, to_char(YAOHLSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as YAOHLSCSJ, SHIFPZ, SUODPZ, PEIZLSSL, to_char(SHIJFYSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd Hh24:Mi:ss') as SHIJFYSJ, DINGDMXID FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL WHERE 1=1

exchange-config.caption: 内部要货令(输出到执行层1)

reader.sql: SELECT YAOHLH, T1.NEIBYHZX AS USERCENTER, XUNHBM, KANBKH, TO_CHAR(JIAOFJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS JIAOFJ, TO_CHAR(ZUIZSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZUIZSJ, TO_CHAR(ZUIWSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ZUIWSJ, LINGJBH, LINGJMC, DANW, YAOHSL, BAOZXH, USXH, TO_CHAR(FAYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FAYSJ, '' AS BEIHSJ, TO_CHAR(SHANGXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SHANGXSJ, T1.NEIBGYS_CANGKBH AS CANGKBH, ZICKBH, XIEHD,MUDD, MUDDLX, '01' AS YAOHLZT, DINGDH, SHENGBR, '0' AS YAOHLSL, '0' AS JIAOFLX, JIAOFZL, DAIJFSL, YAOHLLX, '05' AS YAOHLLB, TONGBLSHQJ, BEIZ, '' AS XIAOHCH, '' AS TANGC, '' AS CHEX, '' AS CENG, '' AS SHIFGJ, '1' AS SHIFSCBHD, '1' AS SHIFDYUC, GONGYSDM, GONGYSMC, CHEJ, SHNAGXFS AS SHANGXFS, CHANX, KEH, PEISLB, SHIFLSK, TO_CHAR(YAOHLSCSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS YAOHLSCSJ, '9' AS SHIFPZ, '' AS SUODPZ, PEIZLSSL, TO_CHAR(SHIJFYSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SHIJFYSJ,DINGDMXID FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAOHL T, ${dbSchemal4}CKX_GONGYS T1 WHERE T.USERCENTER = T1.USERCENTER AND T.GONGYSDM = T1.GCBH AND T1.LEIX = '1' AND T.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2670') AND SYSDATE

SELECT 'IMA' IMA, US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH CKBH, US.CHANX ZZCJDM, US.LINGJBH, BHD.KEH, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(MX.BEIHSL, 0.000)), '999999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') BEIHSL, ' ' KC, ' ' GLDY, ' ' FILLER FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_BEIHDMX MX JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ US ON MX.USERCENTER = US.USERCENTER AND US.USH = MX.USH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_BEIHD BHD ON BHD.USERCENTER = MX.USERCENTER AND BHD.BEIHDH = MX.BEIHDH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.CANGKBH=MX.CANGKBH AND CK.USERCENTER=MX.USERCENTER AND (CK.CANGKLX=3 OR CK.CANGKLX=4) WHERE (MX.BIAOS = 0 OR MX.BIAOS = 1) GROUP BY US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH, US.CHANX, US.LINGJBH, BHD.KEH UNION SELECT 'IMA' IMA, US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH CKBH, US.CHANX ZZCJDM, US.LINGJBH, '' KEH, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(US.KEYLJSL, 0.000)), '999999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') BEIHSL, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(US.LINGJSL - NVL(US.KEYLJSL, 0.000), 0.000)), '999999999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') KC, 'UN' GLDY, ' ' FILLER FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_BEIHDMX MX JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ US ON MX.USERCENTER = US.USERCENTER AND US.USH = MX.USH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.CANGKBH=MX.CANGKBH AND CK.USERCENTER=MX.USERCENTER AND (CK.CANGKLX=3 OR CK.CANGKLX=4) WHERE (US.BAOZZT = 4 OR US.BAOZZT = 6) GROUP BY US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH, US.CHANX, US.LINGJBH

SELECT 'FLUX' FLUX, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CSRQ, US.USERCENTER, ' ' KZ, US.LINGJBH, US.GONGYSDM, ' ' FILLER, '+' ||'' SYMBOL, '+000000000' GDSZ1, US.DANW, US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH CKBH, '4' GDSZ2, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(US.LINGJSL,0)), '99999999.999'),' ','0') LINGJSL FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ US JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.CANGKBH=US.CANGKBH AND CK.USERCENTER=US.USERCENTER GROUP BY US.USERCENTER, LINGJBH, GONGYSDM, DANW, US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE MX.RUKLX WHEN '1' THEN 'A01' WHEN '2' THEN 'A01' WHEN '4' THEN 'A01' WHEN '3' THEN 'A03' END C1, CASE MX.RUKLX WHEN '4' THEN 'S' ELSE ' ' END C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, MX.LINGJBH C5, 1 C6, MX.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, MX.DANW C9, SUBSTR(MX.BLH,LENGTH(MX.BLH)-9,LENGTH(MX.BLH)) C10, TO_CHAR(MX.RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C11, MX.CHENGYSDM C12, 'N' C13, 'S' C14, MX.CANGKBH C15, ' ' C16, ' ' C17, 'N' C18, ' ' C19, ' ' C20, MX.PICH C21, MX.DINGDH C22, case L.lingjsx when 'K' then '1' else '4' end C23, MX.CANGKBH || MX.ZICKBH C24, CASE MX.GONGYSLX WHEN '1' THEN '1' ELSE ' ' END C25, MX.USERCENTER C26, TO_CHAR(MX.RUKSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C27, TO_CHAR(MX.RUKSJ, 'HH24MI') C28, MX.CANGKGLYZ C29, MX.EDITOR C30, MX.UTH C31, TO_CHAR(MX.BLSCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C32, MX.ELH C33, CASE MX.RUKLX WHEN '3' THEN ' ' ELSE MX.CHANX END C34, ' ' C35, TO_CHAR(MX.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C36, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(MX.LINGJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C37 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_RUKMX MX JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.USERCENTER = MX.USERCENTER AND CK.CANGKBH = MX.CANGKBH AND CK.CANGKLX != 4 JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJ L ON MX.USERCENTER=L.USERCENTER AND MX.LINGJBH=L.LINGJBH WHERE MX.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH='2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C27,C28 )T UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( select 'A01'C1,'S'C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, T1.LINGJBH C5, 1 C6, T2.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, T2.DANW C9, T2.BLH C10, TO_CHAR(T2.RUKRQ, 'YYYYMMDD') C11, T2.CHENGYSDM C12, 'N' C13, 'S' C14, T2.CANGKBH C15, ' ' C16, ' ' C17, 'N' C18, ' ' C19, ' ' C20, T2.PICH C21, ' ' C22, ' ' C23, T1.CANGKBH || T1.ZICKBH C24, CASE T2.GONGYSLX WHEN '1' THEN '1' ELSE ' ' END C25, T2.USERCENTER C26, TO_CHAR(T2.RUKRQ, 'YYYYMMDD') C27, TO_CHAR(T2.RUKRQ, 'HH24MI') C28, T2.CANGKGLYZ C29, ' ' C30, T2.UTH C31, ' ' C32, T2.ELH C33, CASE T2.RUKLX WHEN '3' THEN ' ' ELSE T2.CHANX END C34, ' ' C35, TO_CHAR(T1.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C36, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(T1.LINGJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C37 from ${dbSchemal4}ck_chengptxb t1,${dbSchemal4}ck_usbq t2 where t1.usercenter=t2.usercenter and t1.ush=t2.ush and t1.zhuangt in ('2','3') AND T1.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH='2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C27,C28 ) Q

SELECT C1, C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, T.LINGJBH C5, '1' C6, T.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, T.DANW C9, SUBSTR(T.BLH,LENGTH(T.BLH)-9,LENGTH(T.BLH)) C10, TO_CHAR(T.SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C11, T.CHENGYSDM C12, 'N' C13, 'S' C14, T.CANGKBH C15, ' ' C16, ' ' C17, 'N' C18, ' ' C19, ' ' C20, ' ' C21, ' ' C22, ' ' C23, T.CANGKBH || T.ZICKBH C24, ' ' C25, T.USERCENTER C26, TO_CHAR(T.SHENGCSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C27, TO_CHAR(T.SHENGCSJ, 'HH24MI') C28, T.CANGKGLYZ C29, T.EDITOR C30, ' ' C31, ' ' C32, T.ELH C33, ' ' C34, ' ' C35, TO_CHAR(T.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C36, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(T.LINGJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C37 FROM (SELECT CASE D1.DANJLX WHEN '2' THEN 'A08' WHEN '1' THEN 'A10' END C1, CASE D1.DANJLX WHEN '2' THEN 'S' WHEN '1' THEN ' ' END C2, D1.* FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_FANXD D1 WHERE (D1.DANJLX = 2 AND D1.ZHUANGT = 0) OR (D1.DANJLX = 1 AND D1.ZHUANGT = 1) UNION ALL SELECT 'A08' C1, ' ' C2, D2.* FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_FANXD D2 WHERE D2.DANJLX = 2 AND (D2.ZHUANGT = 1 OR (D2.ZHUANGT = 0 AND D2.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE))) T JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.USERCENTER = T.USERCENTER AND CK.CANGKBH = T.CANGKBH AND CK.CANGKLX != 3 AND CK.CANGKLX != 4 WHERE T.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C27,C28

SELECT C1, C2, '' C3, '' C4, C5, '1' C6, C7, C8, T.DANW C9, SUBSTR(T.BLH,LENGTH(T.BLH)-9,LENGTH(T.BLH)) C10, TO_CHAR(T.JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C11, T.CHENGYSMC C12, 'N' C13, 'S' C14, T.CANGKBH C15, ' ' C16, ' ' C17, 'N' C18, ' ' C19, ' ' C20, T.PICH C21, ' ' C22, ' ' C23, T.CANGKBH || T.ZICKBH C24, ' ' C25, T.USERCENTER C26, TO_CHAR(T.JIUFSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C27, TO_CHAR(T.JIUFSJ, 'HH24MI') C28, T.CANGKGLYZ C29, T.EDITOR C30, T.UTH C31, ' ' C32, T.ELH C33, ' ' C34, ' ' C35, TO_CHAR(T.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C36, C37 FROM (
SELECT 'A25' C1, '' C2, D2.*, D2.LINGJBH C5, D2.GONGYSDM C7, CASE WHEN D2.SHIJKCSL >= D2.LILKCSL THEN '+' ELSE '-' END||' ' AS C8, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(D2.SHIJKCSL - D2.LILKCSL, '9999999.999'),
' ', '0'), '-', '0') C37 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_JIUFD D2 WHERE D2.ZHUANGT = 1 AND D2.SHIJKCSL != D2.LILKCSL UNION ALL SELECT 'A25' C1, '' C2, D3.*, D3.SHIJLJBH C5, D3.SHIJGYSBH C7, '+'||' 'AS C8, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(D3.SHIJLJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C37 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_JIUFD D3 WHERE D3.ZHUANGT = 1 AND D3.SHIJLJBH IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'A25' C1, 'S' C2, D2.*, D2.LINGJBH C5, D2.GONGYSDM C7, CASE WHEN D2.SHIJKCSL >= D2.LILKCSL THEN '+' ELSE '-' END ||' ' AS C8, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(D2.SHIJKCSL- D2.LILKCSL, '9999999.999'),
' ', '0'), '-', '0') C37
FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_JIUFD D2 WHERE D2.ZHUANGT = 2 AND D2.SHIJKCSL != D2.LILKCSL UNION ALL SELECT 'A25' C1, 'S' C2, D3.*, D3.SHIJLJBH C5, D3.SHIJGYSBH C7, '+'||' 'AS C8, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(D3.SHIJLJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C37 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_JIUFD D3 WHERE D3.ZHUANGT = 2 AND D3.SHIJLJBH IS NOT NULL) T JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.USERCENTER = T.USERCENTER AND CK.CANGKBH = T.CANGKBH AND CK.CANGKLX != 3 AND CK.CANGKLX != 4 WHERE T.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C27,C28

SELECT substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) C1, ' ' C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, MX.LINGJBH C5, ' ' C6, MX.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, MX.DANW C9, substr(MX.Fahtzdh,4) C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, MX.MUDD C13, ' ' C15, MX.PICH C16, ' ' C17, ' ' C18, MX.CANGKBH || MX.ZICKBH C19, '' C20, MX.USERCENTER C21, TO_CHAR(MX.Chukrq, 'YYYYMMDD') C22, TO_CHAR(MX.Chukrq, 'HH24MI') C23, '' C24, MX.EDITOR C25, ' ' C26, ' ' C27, MX.ELH C28, MX.UCH C29, ' ' C30, TO_CHAR(MX.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C31, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(MX.Lingjsl, '9999999.999') , ' ', '0') C33 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ MX WHERE substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) = 'A35' AND MX.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C22,C23

exchange-config.caption: 仓库流水帐-备货单 A36

reader.sql: SELECT substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) C1, ' ' C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, MX.LINGJBH C5, '1' C6, MX.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, MX.DANW C9, substr(MX.Fahtzdh,4) C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, TO_CHAR(MX.CHUKRQ, 'YYYYMMDD') C13, ' ' C14, ' ' C15, ' ' C16, MX.PICH C17, ' ' C18, ' ' C19, MX.CANGKBH || MX.ZICKBH C20, ' ' C21, MX.USERCENTER C22, TO_CHAR(MX.CHUKRQ, 'YYYYMMDD') C23, TO_CHAR(MX.CHUKRQ, 'HH24MI') C24, ' ' C25, MX.EDITOR C26, ' ' C27, ' ' C28, MX.ELH C29, MX.cheph C30, ' ' C31, TO_CHAR(MX.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C32, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(MX.Lingjsl, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C34 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ MX WHERE substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) = 'A36' AND MX.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C23,C24

exchange-config.caption: 仓库流水帐-正常退库 A38

reader.sql: SELECT 'A38' C1, ' ' C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, K.LINGJBH C5, ' ' C6, K.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, K.DANW C9, K.ZHANGH C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, K.KEH C13, ' ' C15, K.PICH C16, ' ' C17, ' ' C18, K.CANGKBH || K.ZICKBH C19, ' ' C20, K.USERCENTER C21, TO_CHAR(K.CAOZSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C22, TO_CHAR(K.CAOZSJ, 'HH24MI') C23, '' C24, K.EDITOR C25, ' ' C26, ' ' C27, K.ELH C28, ' ' C29, ' ' C30, TO_CHAR(K.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C31, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(K.LINGJSL, '9999999.999'), ' ', '0') C33 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_ZHENGCTK K WHERE K.CAOZM = 'A35' AND K.TUIKLB = 1 AND K.ZHUANGT = 2 AND K.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C22,C23

exchange-config.caption: 仓库流水帐-正常退库 A39

reader.sql: SELECT 'A39' C1, ' ' C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, K.LINGJBH C5, '1' C6, K.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, K.DANW C9, K.ZHANGH C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, TO_CHAR(K.CAOZSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C13, ' ' C14, ' ' C15, ' ' C16, K.PICH C17, ' ' C18, ' ' C19, K.CANGKBH || K.ZICKBH C20, ' ' C21, K.USERCENTER C22, TO_CHAR(K.CAOZSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C23, TO_CHAR(K.CAOZSJ, 'HH24MI') C24, ' ' C25, K.EDITOR C26, ' ' C27, ' ' C28, K.ELH C29, ' ' C30, ' ' C31, TO_CHAR(K.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C32, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(K.LINGJSL, '9999999.999') , ' ', '0') C34 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_ZHENGCTK K JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.USERCENTER = K.USERCENTER AND CK.CANGKBH = K.CANGKBH AND CK.CANGKLX != 3 AND CK.CANGKLX != 4 WHERE K.CAOZM = 'A36' AND K.TUIKLB = 1 AND K.ZHUANGT = 2 AND K.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C23,C24

SELECT C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6, C7, C8, C9, C10, C11, ROWNUM C12, '+'||REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR( T3.LINGJSL, '999999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') C13 , B.DANW C14, B.SHANGXLX C15, T2.LINGJBH C16, L.DINGDH C17, '' C18, T2.UAKH C19, B.UAXH C20, B.UCH C21, B.UCXH C22, B.UCRL C23, T2.LINGJSL C24, L.YAOHLH C25, B.PICH C26, '' C27, '' C28, '' C32, '' C33, '' C34, B.GONGYSDM C29, '' C30, '' C31, Z.USERCENTER FROM (SELECT T.ZHUANGCDH C1, to_char(T.EDIT_TIME, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') C2, ' ' C3, '' C4, T.YUNSSBM C5, ' ' C6, T1.XIEHD C7, T.EDITOR C8, T.CHEP C9, 0 C10, 0 C11, T1.UAKH, T.USERCENTER, T1.YAOHLBH, T1.LINGJBH, T1.LINGJSL FROM ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCFY T JOIN ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCMY T1 ON T1.ZHUANGCDH = T.ZHUANGCDH) T2 JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ B ON T2.USERCENTER = B.USERCENTER AND T2.C1 = B.PEIZDH AND T2.UAKH = B.UCH INNER JOIN (SELECT YHL.* FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL YHL INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_KEHB KH ON YHL.KEH = KH.KEHBH WHERE KH.KEHXZ = '0') L ON L.USERCENTER = T2.USERCENTER AND T2.YAOHLBH = L.YAOHLH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_XIEHZT Z ON Z.XIEHZTBH = T2.C7 JOIN (SELECT F.PEIZDH, Y.LINGJBH, SUM(Y.LINGJSL) LINGJSL FROM ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCFY F JOIN ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCMY Y ON Y.ZHUANGCDH = F.ZHUANGCDH WHERE F.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2700') AND SYSDATE GROUP BY F.PEIZDH, Y.LINGJBH) T3 ON T3.PEIZDH = T2.C1 AND T2.LINGJBH = T3.LINGJBH

SELECT 'A53' C1, '' C2, '' C3, '' C4, Y.LINGJBH C5, '' C6, Y.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, L.DANW C9, ' ' C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, ' ' C13, ' ' C14, ' ' C15, Y.CHANX C16, ' ' C17, ' ' C18, Y.PICH C19, ' ' C20, ' ' C21, Y.CANGKBH || Y.ZICKBH C22, ' ' C23, Y.USERCENTER C24, TO_CHAR(Y.WEIHSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C25, TO_CHAR(Y.WEIHSJ, 'HH24MI') C26, Y.CANGKGLYZ C27, Y.PANDR C28, Y.UTH C29, ' ' C30, Y.ELH C31, ' ' C32, TO_CHAR(Y.WEIHSJ, 'YYYYMMDD') C33, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(Y.SHIJUSSL, '9999999.999') ,' ', '0') C34 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_PANDCY Y JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJ L ON Y.USERCENTER = L.USERCENTER AND Y.LINGJBH = L.LINGJBH WHERE Y.WEIHSJ BETWEEN (SELECT Z.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB Z WHERE Z.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE

SELECT substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) C1, ' ' C2, ' ' C3, ' ' C4, MX.LINGJBH C5, ' ' C6, MX.GONGYSDM C7, '+'||' ' C8, MX.DANW C9, substr(MX.Fahtzdh,4) C10, ' ' C11, ' ' C12, MX.MUDD C13, ' ' C15, MX.PICH C16, ' ' C17, ' ' C18, MX.CANGKBH || MX.ZICKBH C19, '' C20, MX.USERCENTER C21, TO_CHAR(MX.Chukrq, 'YYYYMMDD') C22, TO_CHAR(MX.Chukrq, 'HH24MI') C23, '' C24, MX.EDITOR C25, ' ' C26, ' ' C27, MX.ELH C28, ' ' C29, ' ' C30, TO_CHAR(MX.EDIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') C31, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(MX.Lingjsl, '9999999.999') , ' ', '0') C33 FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ MX WHERE substr(MX.Fahtzdh,1,3) = 'A70' AND MX.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH = '2460') AND SYSDATE ORDER BY C22,C23

SELECT USERCENTER||','||UTH||','||TO_CHAR(UTSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')||','|| BLH||','||TCH||','||TO_CHAR(BLSCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')||','||YUANUTH||','||YUANBLH AS DATA FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_DAOHTZD WHERE 1=1

SELECT USERCENTER||','||UTH||','||UAH||','||ULH||','||BLH||','||ELH||','||GONGYSDM||','||LINGJBH||','|| LINGJMC||','||CANGKBH||','||ZICKBH||','||DANW||','||LINGJSL AS DATA from ${dbSchemal4}CK_UABQ WHERE 1=1

SELECT DATA,EDIT_TIME FROM (SELECT USERCENTER || ',' || UCH || ',' || USH || ',' || ELH || ',' || CANGKBH || ',' || ZICKBH || ',' || KUWBH || ',' || USXH || ',' || USRL || ',' || UCXH || ',' || UCRL || ',' || UCGS || ',' || UAH || ',' || UAXH || ',' || UARL || ',' || LINGJBH || ',' || LINGJMC || ',' || DANW || ',' || LINGJSL || ',' || GONGYSDM || ',' || TO_CHAR(CHUKRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') || ',' || SUBSTR(t1.Fahtzdh, 1, 3) AS DATA,T1.EDIT_TIME AS EDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ T1 WHERE substr(t1.Fahtzdh, 1, 3) in ('A35', 'A36') UNION ALL SELECT USERCENTER || ',' || BIAOQH || ',,' || ELH || ',' || CANGKBH || ',' || ZICKBH || ',,,,,,,,,,' || LINGJBH || ',,' || DANW || ',' || LINGJSL || ',' || GONGYSDM || ',' || TO_CHAR(CAOZSJ, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') || ',' || DECODE(CAOZM, 'A35', 'A38', 'A36', 'A39') AS DATA,T2.EDIT_TIME AS EDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_ZHENGCTK T2 WHERE t2.caozm in ('A35', 'A36')) WHERE 1=1

SELECT 'AVX' AVX, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') CSRQ, US.CANGKBH || US.ZICKBH YSXX, BHD.KEH SHXX, BHD.CHANX ZZSCJDM, MX.LINGJBH XSSLJDM, MX.DANW GLDYDM, '+' SLBJ, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(MX.SHIFSL, '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') SHIFSL, US.USH, '0000054011' EVTIMPUT, BHD.KEH, ' ' JSJYKH, ' ' AFFAIRE, ' ' PJLX, ' ' MXLJ, 'F' KEHLX, ' ' BB, TO_CHAR(ROWNUM) JLHH, TO_CHAR(ROWNUM-1) SYGJLHH, MX.DINGDH DDH, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR( NVL(MX.SHIFSL * LJ.LINGJZL, 0), '9999.999') ,'.', ''),' ','0')MAOZ, LJKEH.KEHLJH, 'N' KEHDMKC, '+' ZLBJ, REPLACE(REPLACE(TO_CHAR(NVL(LJ.LINGJZL, 0), '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') LINGJZL, ' ' ETIUMP, ' ' ZZX, ' ' TSLJ FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_BEIHDMX MX JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_BEIHD BHD ON MX.USERCENTER = BHD.USERCENTER AND MX.BEIHDH = BHD.BEIHDH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_USBQ US ON US.USH = MX.USH AND US.USERCENTER = MX.USERCENTER JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJ LJ ON LJ.USERCENTER = MX.USERCENTER AND LJ.LINGJBH = MX.LINGJBH LEFT JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJKH LJKEH ON LJKEH.USERCENTER = MX.USERCENTER AND MX.LINGJBH = LJKEH.LINGJBH JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_CANGK CK ON CK.CANGKBH=MX.CANGKBH AND CK.USERCENTER=MX.USERCENTER AND (CK.CANGKLX=3 OR CK.CANGKLX=4) WHERE (MX.BIAOS = 2 OR MX.BIAOS = 3) AND LJ.BIAOS = 1 AND MX.EDIT_TIME BETWEEN (SELECT B.LASTCPLTIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB B WHERE B.INBH='2470') AND SYSDATE
select YAOHLH, '0' ||replace(replace(to_char(yanssl, '99999999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as YANSSL, to_char(RUKSJ, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss') as RUKSJ,DANW,LJH,TBBS from ${dbSchemal4}in_rkfk

SELECT T4.jfdh jfdh,T4.tch tch,T4.um um,T4.lingjh lingjh, '+' ||sum(lingjsl) as lingjsl FROM (SELECT jfdh, T2.D04A001 AS tch, um, lingjh, lingjsl FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_EDI_FHTZ_FYXX T2 JOIN (SELECT Z.T01A001 JFDH, Z.A04A002 LINGJH, T1.LINGJSL, T1.B04A001 UM FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_EDI_FHTZ_FYMX Z JOIN (
SELECT T.B04A001, T.T01A001, T.XUH, REPLACE(TO_CHAR(SUM(T.B05AB02), '9999999.99'), ' ', '0') LINGJSL FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_EDI_FHTZ_BZXX T GROUP BY B04A001, T01A001, T.XUH) T1 ON T1.XUH = Z.XUH AND Z.T01A001 = T1.T01A001) T3 ON T3.JFDH = T2.T01A001 where t2.cj_date between (select b.lastcpltime from ${dbSchemal4}in_zidb b where b.inbh = '2500') and sysdate) T4 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY T4.jfdh,T4.tch,T4.um,T4.lingjh

SELECT USERCENTER, JISZQ, DINGDH, HETH, DINGDLX, GONGYSDM, GONGYSLX, CHULLX, DINGDZT, DINGDSXCZR, DINGDSXSJ, DINGDFSSJ, SHIFFSGYS, BEIZ, DINGDJSSJ, DINGDNR, ZIYHQRQ, FAHZQ, MAOXQBC, JISLX, SHIFZFSYHL, SHIFYJSYHL, ACTIVE FROM ${dbSchemal4}XQJS_DINGD WHERE DINGDZT='4' and SHIFYJSYHL='1'

SELECT rpad(T2.FHTZH,10,' ')||','||rpad(T2.SCSJ,14,' ')||','||rpad(T2.FSSJ,16,' ')||','||rpad(T2.DDSJ,16,' ')||','|| rpad(T2.CHENYS,17,' ')||','||rpad(nvl(T2.GONGYS,' '),10,' ')||','||rpad(T2.XIEHD,15,' ')||','||rpad(T2.KACH,10,' ')||','|| rpad(T2.USERCENTER,2,' ')||','||rpad(T2.LINGJH,10,' ')||','||rpad(T2.LINGJMC,40,' ')||','||rpad(T2.LINGJSL,9,' ')||','|| rpad(T2.YAOHLH,22,' ')||','||rpad(B.UCXH,6,' ')||',' || rpad(replace(to_char(B.UCGS, '999999999'), ' ', ''),9,' ')||','|| rpad(replace(to_char(B.UCRL, '999999.99'), ' ', ''),9,' ')||','|| rpad(' ',10,' ')||',' AS DATA FROM (SELECT T.PEIZDH, T.Zhuangcdh FHTZH, to_char(T.EDIT_TIME, 'yyyyMMddHHmiss') SCSJ, to_char(PZ.FAYSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmiss') FSSJ, to_char(PZ.DAOCSJ, 'yyyyMMddHHmiss') DDSJ, T.YUNSSBM CHENYS, T.GONGYSBM GONGYS, T1.XIEHD XIEHD, T.CHEP KACH, T1.UAKH, T.USERCENTER usercenter, T1.YAOHLBH YAOHLH, T1.LINGJBH LINGJH, T1.LINGJMC LINGJMC, replace(to_char(T1.LINGJSL, '999999.99'), ' ', '') as lingjsl, T.EDIT_TIME FROM ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCFY T JOIN ${dbSchemal4}FJ_ZHUANGCMY T1 ON T1.ZHUANGCDH = T.ZHUANGCDH INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal4}FJ_PEIZD PZ ON T.PEIZDH = PZ.PEIZDH) T2 INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CK_UCBQ B ON T2.USERCENTER = B.USERCENTER AND T2.PEIZDH = B.PEIZDH AND T2.UAKH = B.UCH INNER JOIN (SELECT YHL.* FROM ${dbSchemal4}CK_YAONBHL YHL INNER JOIN ${dbSchemal4}CKX_KEHB KH ON YHL.KEH = KH.KEHBH WHERE KH.KEHXZ = '1') L ON L.USERCENTER = T2.USERCENTER AND T2.YAOHLH = L.YAOHLH WHERE 1=1 AND TO_CHAR(T2.EDIT_TIME,'yyyymmddHH24MIss') BETWEEN (SELECT TO_CHAR(i.LASTCPLTIME, 'yyyymmddHH24MIss') FROM ${dbSchemal4}IN_ZIDB i WHERE i.INBH = '2510') and to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddHH24MIss')

select (case upper(substr(t.yaohlh,length(t.yaohlh))) when 'P' then substr(t.yaohlh,0,length(t.yaohlh)-1) else t.yaohlh end ) as yaohlh, t.usercenter as usercenter, to_char(t.jiaofj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as jiaofj, to_char(t.zuizsj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as zuizsj, to_char(t.zuiwsj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as zuiwsj, t.lingjbh as tlingjbh, z.gcbh cysbh, t.danw as tdanw, replace(replace(to_char(t.yaohsl, '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as yaohsl, t.baozxh as baozxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.usxh, '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as usxh, t.ucxh as ucxh, replace(replace(to_char(t.ucrl, '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as ucrl, t.ucgs as ucgs, to_char(t.faysj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as faysj, t.xiehd as xiehd, t.mudd as mudd, t.dingdh as dingdh, t.yaohllx as yaohllx, t.tongblshqj as tongblshqj, t.chej as chej, t.shnagxfs as shnagxfs, t.chanx as chanx, t1.gongcbm as gongcbm, t.peislb as peislb, to_char(t.yaohlscsj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as yaohlscsj, y.lingjxh as lingjxh, y.zhengclsh as zhengclsh, to_char(t.shangxsj, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') as zhengcsxsj, y.weiz as weiz, nvl(t.lingjbh,y.lingjbh) as ylingjbh, nvl(t.gongysdm,y.gongysdm) as gongysdm, decode(t.cangkbh,null,' ',t.cangkbh)|| decode(t.zickbh,null,' ',t.zickbh)||t.beiz as gongysmc, replace(replace(to_char(y.lingjsl, '99999.999'), '.', ''), ' ', '0') as lingjsl, y.danw as ydanw, substr(to_char(z.xuh),length(to_char(z.xuh))-1,2) as wuldbh, z.shifjk as shifjk, '' jh, to_char(t.create_time, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') cjdate, t.chengysdm zhgongysdm from ${dbSchemal4}ck_yaohl t left join ${dbSchemal4}ck_tongbjpd y on t.yaohlh = y.yaohlh and t.usercenter = y.usercenter left join ${dbSchemal4}ck_daowldsj z on t.yaohlh = z.yaohlh and t.usercenter = z.usercenter left join ${dbSchemal4}ckx_xiehzt t1 on t.xiehd = t1.xiehztbh where yaohlzt = '01' and (nvl(t.shiflsk,'0')='0' or nvl(t.shifpz,'0') = '1') and yaohllx <> 'SY' and t.edit_time between (select b.lastcpltime - 1/(24*60) from ${dbSchemal4}in_zidb b where b.inbh = '2520') and sysdate
select zzzx, lingjbh, yxbh, ddrq, '' as filler, replace(to_char(shul, '9999999'),' ','0') as shul, zfbj, hgbm, xianh, lyxt, usercenter, '' as filtern from ${dbSchemal4}in_zcpc

SELECT USERCENTER, LINGJBH, XIAOHDBH, WULBH, FENPQBH, SHENGCXBH, PEISLXBH, QIANHCBS, JIPBZWZ, SHENGXR, JIESR, GUANLYBH, TIQJSXHBL, XIAOHBL, GONGYSBH, SHUNXGLBZ, ZIDFHBZ, XIANBYHLX, YANCSXBZ, BEIHDBZ, XIAOHCBH, XIAOHCCXBH, YUANXHDBH, ANQKCTS, ANQKCS, XIANBLLKC, YIFYHLZL, JIAOFZL, XITTZZ, PDSBZ, BIAOS, ZHONGZZL, ZUH ,GONGYBS FROM ${dbSchemal4}CKX_LINGJXHD WHERE 1=1 and biaos!='2' and creator='2090'

select usercenter, lingjbh, cangkbh, zickbh, yuanckbh, xiehztbh, anqkcts, anqkcsl, zuidkcts, zuidkcsl, dingdbdzl, dingdzzzl, yijfzl, xittzz, danqkbh, danqkw, zuidsx, zuixxx, jistzz, zuixqdl, shifxlh, beiykbh, dingzkw, usbzlx, usbzrl, uclx, ucrl, fifo, zidfhbz, zuh from ${dbSchemal4}ckx_lingjck where 1=1
